item.title: Lanning swipes at SEC, touts Ducks' case for CFP
item.description: Dan Lanning allowed himself to do some CFP politicking after Oregon registered its 10th win of the season, a 42-27 victory over USC.

item.title: Ducks crack top 5 of AP poll; Canes top ACC pack
item.description: Oregon returned to the top five of The Associated Press Top 25 college football poll, while five ACC teams were ranked for the second time this season...

item.title: T.J. passes bro J.J. for most sacks in Watt family
item.description: With a strip sack of Bears quarterback Caleb Williams in the end zone, the Steelers' T.J. Watt, 31, surpassed J.J. Watt, 36, in career sacks.

item.title: FSU to retain embattled Norvell for 2026 season
item.description: Florida State football coach Mike Norvell, who is 7-16 (3-13 in ACC play) over the past two seasons, will return for a seventh year with the Seminoles...

item.title: Sources: Durant to miss 2 games for family issue
item.description: Rockets star Kevin Durant will miss the next two games -- at Phoenix and at Golden State -- while tending to a family matter, sources told ESPN.
